description: Hearts v Hibs: Pick of the stats
title: Hearts v Hibs: Pick of the stats
title_page: Hearts v Hibs: Pick of the stats - BBC Sport
maintext:
Hibs are winless in six Scottish Premiership away games against rivals Hearts (D4 L2) â€“ but their last such win came on Boxing Day in 2019 (2-0).
Hearts have only lost one of their last 12 Scottish Premiership meetings with Hibs (W4 D7), going down 1-0 in April 2023.
